gaia::content::TypedArray Class Reference

Container for an array of values that were retrieved with Resources::obtainAttributes. More...

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (TypedArray)

Detailed Description

Container for an array of values that were retrieved with Resources::obtainAttributes.

Definition at line 35 of file TypedArray.h.

bool  defValue 
) const

Retrieve the boolean value for the attribute at index.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined.
Returns:
Attribute boolean value, or defValue if not defined.
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getColor ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  defValue 
) const

Retrieve the color value for the attribute at index.

If the attribute references a color resource holding a complex ColorStateList, then the default color from the set is returned.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute color value, or defValue if not defined.
ColorStateList* gaia::content::TypedArray::getColorStateListN ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the ColorStateList for the attribute at index.

The value may be either a single solid color or a reference to a color or complex ColorStateList description.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
ColorStateList for the attribute, or null if not defined.
float gaia::content::TypedArray::getDimension ( int32_t  index,
float  defValue 
) const

Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index.

Unit conversions are based on the current core::DisplayMetrics associated with the resources this TypedArray object came from.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute dimension value multiplied by the appropriate metric, or defValue if not defined.
See also:
getDimensionPixelOffset
getDimensionPixelSize
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getDimensionPixelOffset ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  defValue 
) const

Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index for use as an offset in raw pixels.

This is the same as getDimension, except the returned value is converted to integer pixels for you. An offset conversion involves simply truncating the base value to an integer.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute dimension value multiplied by the appropriate metric and truncated to integer pixels, or defValue if not defined.
See also:
getDimension
getDimensionPixelSize
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getDimensionPixelSize ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  defValue 
) const

Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index for use as a size in raw pixels.

This is the same as getDimension, except the returned value is converted to integer pixels for use as a size. A size conversion involves rounding the base value, and ensuring that a non-zero base value is at least one pixel in size.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute dimension value multiplied by the appropriate metric and truncated to integer pixels, or defValue if not defined.
See also:
getDimension
getDimensionPixelOffset
gaia::graphics::Drawer* gaia::content::TypedArray::getDrawerN ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the Drawer for the attribute at index.

This gets the resource ID of the selected attribute, and uses Resources::getDrawer of the owning Resources object to retrieve its Drawer.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
graphics::Drawer for the attribute, or null if not defined.

float gaia::content::TypedArray::getFraction ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  base,
int32_t  pbase,
float  defValue 
) const

Retrieve a fractional unit attribute at index.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
baseThe base value of this fraction. In other words, a standard fraction is multiplied by this value.
pbaseThe parent base value of this fraction. In other words, a parent fraction (nnp) is multiplied by this value.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute fractional value multiplied by the appropriate base value, or defValue if not defined.
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getIndex ( int32_t  at) const

Return an index in the array that has data.

Parameters:
atThe index you would like to returned, ranging from 0 to getIndexCount.
Returns:
The index at the given offset, which can be used with getValue and related APIs.

int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getLayoutDimension ( int32_t  index,
const gaia::base::String &  name 
) const

Special version of getDimensionPixelSize for retrieving WidgetController's layout_width and layout_height attributes.

This is only here for performance reasons; applications should use getDimensionPixelSize.

Parameters:
indexIndex of the attribute to retrieve.
nameTextual name of attribute for error reporting.
Returns:
Attribute dimension value multiplied by the appropriate metric and truncated to integer pixels.
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getLayoutDimension ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  defValue 
) const

Special version of getDimensionPixelSize for retrieving WidgetController's layout_width and layout_height attributes.

This is only here for performance reasons; applications should use getDimensionPixelSize.

Parameters:
indexIndex of the attribute to retrieve.
defValueThe default value to return if this attribute is not default or contains the wrong type of data.
Returns:
Attribute dimension value multiplied by the appropriate metric and truncated to integer pixels.
gaia::base::String gaia::content::TypedArray::getNonResourceString ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the string value for the attribute at index, but only if that string comes from an immediate value in an XML file.

That is, this does not allow references to string resources, string attributes, or conversions from other types. As such, this method will only return strings for TypedArray objects that come from attributes in an XML file.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
String holding string data. Any styling information is removed. Returns null if the attribute is not defined or is not an immediate string value.
gaia::base::String gaia::content::TypedArray::getPositionDescription ( ) const

Returns a message about the parser state suitable for printing error messages.

int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::getResourceId ( int32_t  index,
int32_t  defValue 
) const

Retrieve the resource identifier for the attribute at index.

Note that attribute resource as resolved when the overall TypedArray object is retrieved. As a result, this function will return the resource identifier of the final resource value that was found, not necessarily the original resource that was specified by the attribute.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
defValueValue to return if the attribute is not defined or not a resource.
Returns:
Attribute resource identifier, or defValue if not defined.
Resources* gaia::content::TypedArray::getResourcesN ( ) const

Return the Resources object this array was loaded from.

gaia::base::String gaia::content::TypedArray::getString ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the string value for the attribute at index.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
String holding string data. Any styling information is removed. Returns null if the attribute is not defined.
gaia::base::StringArray gaia::content::TypedArray::getTextArray ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the StringArray for the attribute at index.

This gets the resource ID of the selected attribute, and uses Resources::getTextArray of the owning Resources object to retrieve its StringArray.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
base::StringArray for the attribute, size equals to 0 if not defined.
bool gaia::content::TypedArray::getValue ( int32_t  index,
gaia::core::TypedValue *  outValue 
) const

Retrieve the raw TypedValue for the attribute at index.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
outValuecore::TypedValue object in which to place the attribute's data.
Returns:
Returns true if the value was retrieved, else false.
bool gaia::content::TypedArray::hasValue ( int32_t  index) const

Determines whether there is an attribute at index.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
True if the attribute has a value, false otherwise.
int32_t gaia::content::TypedArray::length ( ) const

Return the number of values in this array.

gaia::core::TypedValue* gaia::content::TypedArray::peekValueN ( int32_t  index) const

Retrieve the raw TypedValue for the attribute at index and return a temporary object holding its data.

This object is only valid until the next call on to TypedArray.

Parameters:
indexIndex of attribute to retrieve.
Returns:
Returns a core::TypedValue object if the attribute is defined, containing its data; otherwise returns null. (You will not receive a core::TypedValue whose type is TYPE_NULL.)
